data.label: Group 128
data.title: Excuse Sequence
data.description: Asks the user is he had a good reason to not do his task

data.label: Group 130
data.title: On Notice Sequence
data.description: Sets a user on notice after a near miss

data.label: Group 131
data.title: Failure Sequence
data.description: When the user failed his task

data.label: Group 133
data.title: Check Previous Task Sequence
data.description: Checks if previous task was completed

data.label: Group 135
data.title: Overdue Task Sequence
data.description: Checks task completedness when already overdue

data.label: Group 140
data.title: Active Day Routing
data.description: Routes the user during his active days

data.label: Group 147
data.title: Inactive Day
data.description: When a user visits on an off day

data.label: Group 148
data.title: Welcome Routing
data.description: First loaded sequence, routes the user

data.label: Group 150
data.title: Pending Task Sequence
data.description: Checks for task completedness before the deadline

data.label: Group 153
data.title: Completed Task Sequence
data.description: Celebrates the user's accomplishment when he returns after completing his task

data.label: Group 154
data.title: Failed Task Sequence
data.description: For when the user returns after failing his task

data.label: Group 30
data.title: Onboarding Sequence
data.description: The bot explains the core concept

data.label: Group 31
data.title: Task Setting Sequence
data.description: Asks the user the name of the task he'll want to perform

data.label: Group 39
data.title: Deadline Sequence
data.description: Asks the user to set a daily deadline

data.label: Group 47
data.title: Active Days Choice Sequence
data.description: Asks the user on which days of the week he'll perform his task

data.label: Group 55
data.title: Reminders Sequence
data.description: Asks the user to set the intensity of his reminders

data.label: Group 59
data.title: Sendoff Sequence
data.description: Last sequence in an interaction, goodbyes

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Do you have a valid excuse this time ?

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Right... That's ok for now, but next time I won't be so lenient.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: You've done it this time. And by done it I mean you didn't. You failed.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: You want to keep this task or set an easier one?

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Uh oh... Looks like you never cleared your last deadline...|||Hopefully it won't happen again

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Ok, so did you manage to do your thing last time?

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Right, the deadline is past you know?

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Do you want to update your task or are you happy with your current one?

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: What are you doing here? You have nothing due today.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Right, come back on those days : {task.activeDays}

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: You are clear today, congrats, come back tomorrow.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Hey, it's ok, let's regroup and nail it tomorrow

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: I'm Tristopher|||But my friends call me Trist

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: So, what should I call you?

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Here is how it's going to work|||You pick one thing you want to achieve daily|||ONE THING|||And I'll be here to make sure you do it

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Let's just say that I've a few trickies up my sleevies|||Or let's not say that|||But you'll see really soon

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: First thing first, think about what you want to accomplish everyday

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: It can be anything really, study, exercise, world domination you name it.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Well yes, I'll ask you everyday.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: {user.task}? Hey, baby steps, smart I guess.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: By what time of the day should your task be completed?

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: {task.deadlineTime}, giving yourself all the time possible, nice

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: By {task.deadlineTime} everyday, I'll consider you've failed.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: On which days of the week can you achieve your task? ({user.task})

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Well this app can't deal with that yet your majesty

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Giving yourself a bit of rest on the weekend, I get that.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: I guess I'll expect great things from you on : {task.activeDays}

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: How hardcore do you need me to be in reminding you?

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Oh boy, that's gonna be fun.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: Fine, you'll get a couple, no biggie.

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: All right champ, you got this obviously...

data.label: Welcome!
data.content: I have something to confess... But it can wait.
